sentence: So lets stop election deniers who might refuse to certify accurate election results they disagree with from taking over our democracy.https://t.co/uhNKFMPNMD Jocelyn Benson (@JocelynBenson) April 3, 2022 The four other award recipients ran the gamut of courageous,? from Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, whose country is involved in a deadly conflict with Russia, to Rep. Liz Cheney (R-WY), who has severed ties with her party through her nonstop condemnations of Trump over the 2020 election.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Top Michigan Democrats Questioned Election Outcomes That Favored Republicans
